import React from 'react'; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement, Filler, } from 'chart.js'; import { Bar, Doughnut, Line, Pie } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import Badge from '../UI/Badge'; import { TrendingUp, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, XCircle, Target, Zap, Calendar, Award, Activity, BarChart3, PieChart, LineChart } from 'lucide-react'; ChartJS.register( CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement ); const ProjectAnalytics = ({ analytics, projectName, isLoading = false }) => { // Helper function to format duration const formatDuration = (days, minutes) => { if (!days && !minutes) return 'N/A'; const daysInt = Math.floor(days); const hours = Math.floor((days - daysInt) * 24); const mins = Math.floor(minutes % 60); if (daysInt > 0) { return `${daysInt}d ${hours}h ${mins}m`; } else if (hours > 0) { return `${hours}h ${mins}m`; } else { return `${mins}m`; } }; if (isLoading) { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map((i) => (
))}

))}
); } if (!analytics) { return (

No analytics data available

Analytics will appear here once tasks are created

); } // Prepare data for charts const taskStatusData = { labels: ['Completed', 'In Progress', 'To Do'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.completed_tasks || 0, analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, analytics.todo_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ '#10b981', // Green for completed '#3b82f6', // Blue for in progress '#f59e0b', // Yellow for todo ], borderColor: [ '#059669', '#2563eb', '#d97706', ], borderWidth: 2, hoverOffset: 4, }, ], }; // Process priority data from backend const priorityData = { labels: ['High', 'Medium', 'Low'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'high')?.count || 0, analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'medium')?.count || 0, analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'low')?.count || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ '#ef4444', // Red for high '#f59e0b', // Yellow for medium '#10b981', // Green for low ], borderColor: [ '#dc2626', '#d97706', '#059669', ], borderWidth: 2, hoverOffset: 4, }, ], }; // Show completion rate and task distribution const progressData = { labels: ['Completed', 'In Progress', 'To Do'], datasets: [ { label: 'Tasks', data: [ analytics.completed_tasks || 0, analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, analytics.todo_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ '#10b981', // Green for completed '#3b82f6', // Blue for in progress '#f59e0b', // Yellow for todo ], borderColor: [ '#059669', '#2563eb', '#d97706', ], borderWidth: 2, }, ], }; const chartOptions = { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)', titleColor: 'white', bodyColor: 'white', borderColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', borderWidth: 1, }, }, }; const doughnutOptions = { ...chartOptions, cutout: '60%', plugins: { ...chartOptions.plugins, legend: { position: 'right', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, }, }; // Check if this is project-specific analytics or general analytics const isProjectSpecific = analytics?.project || projectName; const projectData = analytics?.project; return (

Project: {projectData.name} {projectData.description && ( {projectData.description} )}

0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0)}%` }} >

Team Members

)}

{task.title}

Completed by {task.completed_by} {new Date(task.completed_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{task.priority}
))}
)} {/* Project Timeline (Project-specific only) */} {projectData && (

Project Timeline

Project Start

{new Date(analytics.project_start_date || projectData.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

Last Activity

{new Date(analytics.last_activity || projectData.updated_at).toLocaleDateString()}

)} )}
); }; export default ProjectAnalytics;
